com.github.ffalcinelli.jdivert.windivert

Class DeployHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.ffalcinelli.jdivert.windivert.DeployHandler

  • public class DeployHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles WinDivert DLL and SYS files deployment to a temporary directory. Without this step, WinDivert would not be able to locate SYS file for its Windows Service.

    Created by fabio on 10/11/2016.
